entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The group of people who were ready to attack Harry and his friends. They swerved to avoid the motorbike and its companion.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who helped Harry by slamming his hand onto the purple button, causing dragon fire to burst out.

entities.name: dragon
entities.description: The dragon that was used to attack the Death Eaters. It was summoned by Hagrid.

entities.name: motorbike
entities.description: The motorbike that Harry and his friends were riding on. They were being chased by the Death Eaters.

relationships.description: Hagrid summoned the dragon to attack the Death Eaters.
The Death Eaters were chasing Harry and his friends on their motorbike.
Hagrid's action caused the dragon fire to burst out.
The Death Eaters were attacking Hagrid.
